title: 100 MMSCFD Gas Plant Redevelopment in NE BC
description:
The of the existing facility sought to enhance the recovery of Natural Gas Liquids from new volumes of natural gas. Denali facilitated this process by designing necessary modifications and additions within a limited space, covering everything from FEED to construction and commissioning support. Key changes included replacing the refrigeration system, increasing power generation, and adding NGL storage and shipping infrastructure.
To lower operational expenses, existing features were optimized, including the installation of waste heat recovery units on compressors, an overhaul of the heat medium package, and adjustments to the amine contactor tower and related vessels to utilize a non-regenerative sweetening chemical.
